analysis.description:
TTC (/unique_chucks/16/0x4a0b4540317d156d89a8465041569ad68102d6cd.sol#57-173) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/16/0x4a0b4540317d156d89a8465041569ad68102d6cd.sol#98-109)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/16/0x4a0b4540317d156d89a8465041569ad68102d6cd.sol:
	Contract TTC has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/16/0x4a0b4540317d156d89a8465041569ad68102d6cd.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
